name: gliTchD
description:
This is my first entry in a game jam, and ironically is my first game release as a gamedev, i had a lot of fun making this, the theme was awesome as it gave room to make weird games and maybe leave that damn bug that you can't get rid of in your game, because as the theme goes, it's not a bug, it's a feature, cheers to everyone that participated and to everyone that is playing/reading this.

Kenney Assets used:

  • SciFi RTS Pack
  • Tower Defense Top-Down Pack
  •  Digital SFX Pack
  •  Game Icons Pack
  • Ui RPG Pack
  • Jumper Pack
